eu.eexcess.insa.peas

Class Scheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.eexcess.insa.peas.Scheduler

  • public class Scheduler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the scheduler in charge of managing the query log and the caches.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Thomas Cerqueus

    • Constructor Detail

      • Scheduler

        public Scheduler()
        Default constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • addCachesTasks

        public static void addCachesTasks()
        Adds a task to the scheduler. This task consists in updating the caches regularly. The delay between the execution of two tasks in given in the configuration file. The core of the method is executed only once (even if the method is called several times).

      • flushOutQueryLogTask

        public static void flushOutQueryLogTask()
        Adds a task to the scheduler. This task consists in flushing out the query log regularly. The delay between the execution of two tasks in given in the configuration file. The core of the method is executed only once (even if the method is called several times).
